Negative_Review: A rather ugly modern concrete building not typically Parisian
Positive_Review: very comfortable bed room modern and spacious and clean Large and varied breakfast buffet Hotel very functional with air conditioning which was welcome in warm weather if a little modern and bland convenient for metro

Negative_Review: Coffee in the room could have been a little more generous more milks etc probably could have got them but did not ask
Positive_Review: Nice staff at reception helpful when needed beds bar area and easy to find

Negative_Review: Don t want to say very lively just down the road Depends what you are looking for Shower screen not up to the job but facilities good
Positive_Review: Good location for Montmartre Easy Metro access 20mins to top of hill Very lively night life just down the road

Negative_Review: Gave a shirt which is dear to me to the laundry and still haven t heard anything about it Would have expected a contact by now
Positive_Review: Location was fantastic Size of room was adequate Quick services from housekeeping

Negative_Review: The bedside reading light wasn t bright enough
Positive_Review: Staff location cleanliness and comfort Plus the free drinks made available was great as it was a very hot few days

Negative_Review: The only thing I would change was the paper coffee cups in the room and I should have asked for more milk But that s my problem
Positive_Review: I missed breakfast as I slept in but the wine was good in the afternoon service great especially check in where every thing was explained i asked the reception to book taxi s and they explained the cost time of the journey roughly and organised the taxi promptly I would definitely go back again This is the best comment a hotel could have

Negative_Review: They held 450 out of my account even though the room was only 369 Not over charged just held just in case Then charged 20euro for a breakfast dont get brekkie here go to cafe down road get brekkie for a fiver Also there s a city hotel tax which you only find out about at check out but apart from cost nice place good location There s another mercury 10 min up the toad that s in a dodgy part so book here not there
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: The squeaky bed
Positive_Review: Silent and spacious room with good bath room facilities Breakfast was super with healthy as well as tasty extras Almost perfect location in attractive part of city

Negative_Review: Bed was too hard Needed more pillows Air conditioner had very little power keeping the room too hot
Positive_Review: Location and the terrace bar restaurant Great value

Negative_Review: Proper cups for tea coffee in the room A breakfast menu so that we could have made an informed decision about breakfasting in the hotel As there wasn t we didn t The bed was so hard I woke stiff and sore every morning
Positive_Review: Decor is stunning Separate shower and toilet appreciated We might go again

Negative_Review: I have never encountered such bad staff I booked a total of seven rooms and our flight was delayed so they called my colleague at 2am to see if we were still taking the rooms Also one of the group paid a cash deposit and we were unable to change this to a credit card deposit during the stay for no reason at all Literally the worst service ever
Positive_Review: Th bed was relatively comfy and had a good location

Negative_Review: Old carpet in halls smelly shower dodgy and broken like showering with a tap pressure so bad Hair dryer poor and we were very disappointed
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: The breakfast staff were extremely understaffed One member completely ignored me when I asked for a glass for juice I waited for 20 minutes until they brought glasses The coffee machine needs clearer instructions on how to use it After 2 attempts I gave up and had hot chocolate instead I saw others struggling with it too The bathroom shower was very cheaply made however it had good water pressure so it didn t bother me too much I requested a room with a bath but only got a shower I wouldn t have mind so much had the receptionist at least acknowledged my request And that particular receptionist was quite unwelcoming when I checked in
Positive_Review: The breakfast was absolutely delicious The room was spotless The lobby smelt lovely Great location

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very comfortable hotel for a family of 3 Good breakfast nice bar to spend the evening Very good location Moulin Rouge is just around the corner Very helpful staff helped us quickly with getting all necessary info and tickets There s a parking just next to the hotel so it s easy to get all the luggage to the hotel Metro station is also there Overall we really liked the hotel

Negative_Review: The carpet was filthy The beds were uncomfortable and I don t know whose hair the hair dryer would dry The staff did not know where a laundry was in the neighborhood There is no way this was a 4 star hotel
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Not sure why but in the morning for breakfast they wanted us to eat in what resembled a meeting room very dark and boring Yet across the way was a bright and modern eating area with access to an outside courtyard We refused to eat in the boardroom and enjoyed the outside courtyard First Bedroom was ok but clear it was aimed at business people but due to an issue with no Aircon we were moved to a room on floor 6 which was very nice
Positive_Review: Very clean and Modern Depending on room went from nice to very nice

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location close to bars restaurants public transport On a very busy road but no noise inside Rooms spacious comfortable and very clean Staff very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The air con wasn t working which made the room very stuffy No face towels shampoo or conditioners were given and we were only given flimsy paper cups
Positive_Review: The location was convenient

Negative_Review: The room view wasn t great but can t really blame the hotel for this They did not have umbrellas when it was lashing rain a few times apparently they ran out of them Some little fittings such as the soap dispenser and fittings on the shower were loose or fell off Just a little bit of maintenance needed but not a big deal
Positive_Review: A nice quiet Hotel in a very busy area in Montmartre Very warm and comfortable Good security presence There is also a nice restaurant bar on the roof terrace and again is very relaxed

Negative_Review: A little out of the way Plenty of restaurants in the area but down the block and around the corner seemed not to be a nicer area of Paris
Positive_Review: Very Nice modern remodel done in 2016 Staff was very helpful and spoke very good English with my broken French Everything looked great and was very accommodating Room had enough space for my wife and myself Bar was very nice with good selection of wines

Negative_Review: First two days were ok however on the third day our anniversary the whole purpose of our trip when we returned to our room during the afternoon 4pm we found that the bedding had been stripped all the towels removed and just left in a mess This greatly upset us as we had planned to go out for a celebratory meal and wanted to relax and get ready for the evening We couldn t actually get back into our room until after 5pm This was after we had a conversation with the hotel management and no attempt was made to give our room priority and we were still guests it was almost as if they had thought we had checked out Response was totally unsatisfactory and no real explanation given Struggled to get tea bags daily in our room plus the fact that there was no smoke alarm and paper cups provided for hot drinks totally unsuitable This left a sour taste and rather spoilt our special day We know mistakes do happen but what upset us most was that there was no sense of urgency in resolving our problem and we had to de camp to the lounge area for over an hour with a token gesture for two free drinks
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good with a wide choice Location was good for Montmartre

Negative_Review: A lighter breakfast e g only coffee and croisant was not an option Anyway the staff arranged it when we asked it
Positive_Review: The outdoor terrace was very nice The environment beside the Montmartre cemetery was peaceful and the cemetery itself really beautiful Good connections with other neighborhoods e g a bus to the Opera where you can take a bus to the airport departed right next to the hotel

Negative_Review: Staff were rudish and unclear about the payment scheme also asked me to leave 100 deposit in card that would not be taken on departure told me it would be refunded So it had been taken and 24 hrs later I still haven t had it back Towels were dirty in room shower nozzle came off n my hand Room with view was not the case Bed ok but struggled to sleep in it in 2nd night Came home with back ache
Positive_Review: The room was a nice size in a good location Water was hot

Negative_Review: The reception area of the hotel is very confusing There is no sign to indicate what area of the reception desk is for check in or check out There is not a clear queuing system and other guests just walk in and get served before those that have been waiting in line We had to wait over 25 minutes before being attended to This would have been longer had a member of staff not decided to call us over to check us in before a guest who had just walked in off the street I mentioned this poor queuing system to the reception staff and they acknowledged this was an ongoing issue
Positive_Review: Reception staff were extremely welcoming and helpful

Negative_Review: The double king was two beds put together badly we had a room mix up and the TV broke but staff were quick to fix the issues
Positive_Review: Staff were great good room size and relatively modern for a Paris hotel

Negative_Review: The breakfast was a little expensive for our budget but we enjoyed to food from the Turkish place opposite
Positive_Review: Being close to many take away and sit down cafes and restaurants we did not have breakfast or evening meal in this well appointed hotel We enjoyed the benefits of the area The room was for us luxurious and the bed was great Facilities were also excellent

Negative_Review: No light at desk under the TV Was a bit dark to work there on my PC I moved the coffee machine over to the table at the TV and worked on my PC where the coffee machine was located This desk has a light
Positive_Review: Near metro Friendly staff Proper coffee machine in room

Negative_Review: This is a modern property It is Paris but could be anywhere Not a negative just a matter of preference
Positive_Review: The rooms were large for Paris and at a reasonable price We had a good view from our window and walked a long block past the Moulin Rouge to the metro with no problem It was a good place for a comfortable nights sleep with friendly front desk staff Big bed and modern bath Elevator fit people and luggage Small refrigerator water heater with tea and coffee

Negative_Review: Add conditioner to the bathrooms I am use to have hair products in the bathrooms Only having shampoo through me off guard and I had to go and buy my own If I knew I would have brought my own Rand vs the Euro Not so great and I have never bought such expensive conditioner in my life
Positive_Review: Breakfast was great nice comfortable beds friendly staff

Negative_Review: Our coffee machine was broken and not replaced But that was only a small problem
Positive_Review: This is a most wonderful hotel in the most wonderful location Sacre Coeur in Walking Distance the buzzing life of Montmartre in front of your doorstep The hotel is chic clean friendly very esay going and has a beautiful bar to relax in The staff behave as if it s a joy to work there and to serve us We had a fantastic view over Paris including the Eiffel Tower our room was spacious and perfectly equipped This was our second stay at the Mercure we are already planning the third

Negative_Review: The food menu with Could have been more diverse
Positive_Review: The rooms were very cosy and the staff were very friendly Found my stay very very welcoming and would recommend to anyone I ve stayed at 2 different Mercure hotels now and on both occasions been very satisfied

Negative_Review: Paper cups for beverage No breakfast tea Only two small pots of milk English cinema channel showed French films in the evening so no tv entertainment when we came in at the end of the day
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Nothing to add here
Positive_Review: The property was fantastic Staff very accommodating and quick to resolve guests issues Great bar and lounge area and again helpful and welcoming staff The location was easy to access and close to all tour bus stops and the fabulous Moulin Rouge

Negative_Review: The bed in our first room was thin and rock hard Our first two nights we slept very badly I reluctantly complained and the customer service was excellent upgrading us to a nicer room for our final night However despite the beautiful room the mattress was pretty much the same and still very hard and uncomfortable A shame really as the hotel itself is awesome
Positive_Review: Great location and easy walking distance to the metro Great views from the upgraded rooms

Negative_Review: Room was cold with heating on one water bottle for a double room To top it off the staff were extremely rude and not friendly to new tourists They did not show any desire to help us and worst of all spoke in French to each other about us and laughed Making it quite clear they were speaking about us I did not find this friendly or welcoming as someone visiting the city
Positive_Review: Besides the location with its close proximity to attractions and underground there wasn t much else to like

Negative_Review: Would have liked that the hotel included the breakfast it was somewhat expensive
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel with great location It was really close to the Moulin Rouge where you can take the tour buses Had nice places to eat next to it and souvenirs stores

Negative_Review: all good cant think of anything bad
Positive_Review: best one in place de clichy from UK stayed 3nights Pets are allowed too which was amazing not a lot of hotels allow it

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Lovely view of Paris and a prime location wishing walking distance of Place de Clichy Facilities were impeccable and room was presented at a good standard

Negative_Review: Checkout clerk was rather rude seemed he was annoyed that we disturbed him at 1 AM but this was stated in our reservation They offer no help with parking despite having a parking in the basement operated by a different company
Positive_Review: Location is right near the Moulin Rouge and close to the Sacre Coeur Room were large by Paris standards and quite nicely decorated The bed was large enough to accommodate a couple of reasonably sized beached whales Breakfast was nice

Negative_Review: Some broken bits that would have been easy to fix e g broken toilet roll holder and panel of the bath hanging off a little bit big greasy handprint on the wall Which was a shame because it would be so easy to fix but it did ruin the impression a little
Positive_Review: Friendly staff really nice and clean hotel in an amazing location right around the corner from the moulin rouge and subway stations place de clichy Really clean relaxing hotel to come back to after a day of walking around paris the bed was really comfortable

Negative_Review: Breakfast was the same every day at least some changes could be made now and then No vegetables for breakfast But there were fresh juice and fruits still
Positive_Review: We were offered a nice room with a view to the Eiffel Tower which was a gift a privileged room It was clean enough but less than expected from a 4 star hotel The bed was comfortable and the staff polite

Negative_Review: Hotel overheated Bed not comfortable too hard Breakfast low quality scrambled eggs had a green tinge and smelt off bacon greasy congealed scraps Dining room furniture shabby and carpet old and dirty Staff hard pressed and some seemed unhappy with their jobs I do not like the way French chain hotels vary their tariff almost daily Creates a sense of exploitation We stayed a total of 5 consecutive days adding 2 days to an initial booking of 3 Yet the posted price changed to a lower price on our 2nd additional day after we had booked and payed in advance at the higher price These sorts of price games are Not Fair
Positive_Review: Location Staff helpful and responded positively to problems with bed giving free upgrade to better room

Negative_Review: if you are travelling with children you may wish to know that the Moulin rouge pigalle is just around the corner and that it is a sex shop district with lots of gadgets etc on full display
Positive_Review: location was great hotel a stones throw from place de clichy metro quietness of room Room great size with great facilities garden terrace in hotel near local shops brilliant transport links near metro 2 place de clichy great for the airport and metro 12 pigalle 10 minutes walk for place de concorde etc

Negative_Review: Only the carpet in the room was very dirty and used Yes we brought our dog but didn t expect to get a room with such a dirty carpet Room number 751
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The very warm reception and location of hotel we had our anniversary there and it was acknowledged by the staff upon arrival This was great and made us feel so welcome I would highly recommend this hotel if visiting Montmartre

Negative_Review: No rea cups saucers in rooms very disappointing considering Bath towels small
Positive_Review: Easy access to attractions metro Staff extremely friendly helpful

Negative_Review: On arrival I asked to have my stay extended by a day and the receptionist said that had been organised I was then thrown out of the hotel a day early as the booking had not been made There was no offer of help for me to find alternative accomadation
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I opted out of the breakfast It is very expensive and outside there are several caf s where you can grab something cheaper
Positive_Review: The rooms were very clean The decoration is good and in general maintenance is great The hotel has a great service for printing The location is good it has very quick access to two very well connected subway lines

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel is situated in a very good area you ll find arround plenty of caffes and restaurants and the Moulin Rouge 5 minutes walk from the metro station It is very quiet the room we had was spacious enough great value for money

Negative_Review: The toilet made you feel like you were sitting in a cupboard and then have to go to the bathroom to wash your hands The bath was very small I m slim so not a problem for me but not too good for larger clients
Positive_Review: Large comfortable bed with nice bedding

Negative_Review: Very little to say here
Positive_Review: Hotel was very clean and in a very good location for all sights etc We had the breakfast option and that was a very good start to the day

Negative_Review: The staff was horrible Unprofessional Unsympathetic Unkind Unpolished Unaware We myself and my group of 5 clients booked our rooms on booking com when the rate was better than the rates for existing reservations made directly through the hotel I booked with booking com and canceled the other At arrival the staff said there were no reservations and refused to look for the booking com reservations They would not allow my travel clients to check in after several hours of flight from the U S and were very rude to them The staff even gave my clients an e mail my office sent them which should have been internal information that should not have been forwarded to any client This email clearly outlined the reservation that were canceled It had the reservation numbers as well The staff didn t bother to look for the valid reservations and showed no care about the plight my clients faced especially since I was delayed All they had to do was take a few extra minutes to look in their system My flight was delayed but I had a layover in Istanbul I called and spoke with the front desk staff Gave them the confirmation numbers given by booking com but the staff refused to listen I had to speak with several people incur high phone charges and even raise my voice to force someone to listen to me My client placed me on the phone with receptionist She again reiterated the reservations were canceled I advised her of the valid confirmation number She ignored me repeatedly simply repeating the reservations were canceled I had to literally raise my voice to force her to look up the confirmation number She then said oh I found it But this was after she continued to be rude and unprofessional forcing me in desperation to raise my voice with her It was very frustrating and my clients were very effected by the lack of professionalism and empathy they were shown Each day was an issue
Positive_Review: The facility is very nice The rooms were great and the proximity to the metro was great as well

Negative_Review: Nothing really it fulfilled our needs
Positive_Review: My wife s second visit to Paris First in 1981 This was my first So The Mercure was an inclusion to the whole trip about Paris It was important that the positive nature of Mercure added to the overall satisfaction and yes it did WE loved the high position of our room seeing over the rooftops of Paris Well insulated for sound and roomy

Negative_Review: For how much the room cost I would say the rooms are quite basic We had to put out our own pillows there were no complimentary snacks or toiletries and the windows were quite small
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a great location really close to Montmartre The staff are friendly and the rooftop bar is great for a night cap

Negative_Review: There were no room slippers
Positive_Review: The location was very near to a tube station it was really convenient to travel The staffs were friendly helpful

Negative_Review: The rooms were not very soundproofed you could hear everything that was going on in the hallway and room next door although I didn t hear any outside noise The only toiletries provided was a bar of soap and a combined shower gel shampoo which was a bit disappointing
Positive_Review: The location was excellent easy walk to the metro as well as the streets of Montmartre and the rooftop terrace was a nice place to sit an have a drink The staff at reception were friendly and efficient

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Wonderful Great location super friendly and efficient staff with comfortable rooms Near by secure car park was a bonus This will be my hotel of choice in Paris going forward

Negative_Review: The only small issue I had were the pillows on the bed Very hard but I didn t ask for them to be changed Also square rather than oblong Small minor thing
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful friendly and efficient Rooms were spotless great location

Negative_Review: Bathtub tooo high for older people to get in to have shower Will not get Accor loyalty points if book through Bookings com Do not take criticism well On second stay room was not as good room as first stay
Positive_Review: Breakfast good

Negative_Review: Better staff communication a little more compassion shown in the circumstances Took money despite non attendance very poor
Positive_Review: Very poor customer service money grabbers not willing to assist in difficult circumstances

Negative_Review: Bed could use a comforter a little uncomfortable but otherwise everything us beatiful fresh and new
Positive_Review: Excellent location walking distance to sacre couer and the moulin rouge

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Located in a lovely area with plenty of cafes and places to eat close to a well connected subway station and we also had a nice walk up to sacre coeur from the hotel We re allowed to check in 30 minutes early as this is when we arrived and hotel held our luggage for us on our last day until our Eurostar which gave us a full extra day to explore without having to carry luggage around Paris

Negative_Review: Didn t feel safe in that area too many sketchy people at night Not like the Latin Quarter The rooms were outdated The carpet was terrible looking I thought the pattern by window was a bleach stain until I saw my daughters room was the same The glass door in front of sink was gone in our room We had to get 2 rooms for the 4 of us Remember if you call a cab to airport they start charging as they drive to you We paid 94
Positive_Review: Lovely looking lobby Helpful staff Walked to Sacre Coeur in the morning for view Close to subway

Negative_Review: The service at the bar was a little disappointing sitting outside for a few minutes until realising that we wouldn t get service unless we went to the bar one evening I went for a glass of red and the bar tender was glued to the TV when I then asked him about the wine he shrugged and said he didn t know anything about the wine he serves Really
Positive_Review: The location was great for us we didn t want to be surrounded by the busy tourist hotspots so staying here was ideal

Negative_Review: Would have liked real shampoo and not bodywash Toilet room was a smoking room for someone Staff were not very friendly welcoming when coming and going Would have liked a lighter comforter for the summer months
Positive_Review: Liked the bathrobes safe free drinks bed Liked the apples in the lobby

Negative_Review: The bed was a little too hard and uncomfortable for our liking
Positive_Review: Very good looking room and hotel in general breakfast was well managed and stocked The hotel staff were always friendly and happy to work with any requests such as storing our luggage on our final day as our train was not until 17 00

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The breakfast was delicious There were so many choices The room was perfect for the three of us The pullout couch was comfortable and we had a partial view of the Eiffel Tower

Negative_Review: Very long check in process Not so friendly staff and very strict to check in time with no exceptions which is odd compared to other hotels that offer early check in for early arrivals
Positive_Review: Room is big and clean wide variety for breakfast and good value for money

Negative_Review: Photos are nicer than reality exterior is pretty average and the street and surroundings aren t great Also barely any amenities no shampoo and conditioner no shower cap and old worn out and thin towels that have threads coming out the sides Only one free small water for two guests that wasn t replaced each day
Positive_Review: Terrace is lovely and bar prices are reasonable

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were simply wonderful especially Liza and Ana They really were most helpful and friendly will definitely be coming back Please pass this on Thank you

Negative_Review: The cleaner barging in at 9am without knocking And then again at 11pm yelling at me checkout was a wonderful 12 noon Don t know what the problem was with het
Positive_Review: Great clean good location

Negative_Review: Arrived to find the room we booked was not available Needed 2 adjacent rooms given we had 2 adults and 2 children Hotel staff sent us to 2 different rooms that weren t adjacent and then finally the 3rd try was a success This took over an hour and everyone was really tired and frustrated No apology for the hassle from the hotel After asking if we could get a complimentary breakfast for the inconvenience there was little interest in anything of that kind Beds were uncomfortable Rooms were not serviced we were there for 2 nights Got a refill on the minibar water and soda only upon request Correct price was not captured at checkout Overall not a good experience I m sure under the right circumstances this could have been a good experience and staff going the extra mile to make us happy with our choice would have made the world of difference but they made no such attempts We certainly won t be coming back
Positive_Review: Good location Trendy looking hotel

Negative_Review: Hotel Location Neighborhood is not very clean sometimes feels unsafe at night Rooms made for 2 people does not comfortably sleep 3 people
Positive_Review: Very Clean Modern Room Decor and Amenities Comfortable Sofa Bed

Negative_Review: Staff could be more welcoming when arrive Didn t acknowledge me until I ask to be help then was ignored but later on we found friendly staff that was helpful
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: General Staff really don t like what they re doing Wrong information about happy hour not aware when it will be finished we had to show their own poster No ventilation in toilet Decoration and carpet outdated and ugly The closet cover has fallen on my foot since it was not fixed well Very poor check out I wanted to see the bill when checking out the guy seemed unpleasant Showed from i pad I asked print out printed unpleasantly Asked me how many times had we have breakfast they don t know miscalculation was corrected by me apology is insufficient Very poor laundry They are applying full charge for pressing in the laundry The delivery timing is late The room they provide for self ironing is small table and ironing device are not maintained leaking No parking availibility No bell boy
Positive_Review: The green area on the 1st floor

Negative_Review: The street location is not very pretty but it felt safe and it is a city after all
Positive_Review: Very comfortable hotel with very pleasant and helpful staff Really no wait time for anything Very well managed Breakfast delicious and included in price Can easily walk to Sacre Coeur from hotel uphill walk on the way to SC I would definitely stay there again

Negative_Review: The maids didn t clean the room well each day leaving rubbish bins full and pillows or towels on the floor When we called room service twice we were told we had to go from the 7th floor to the first to collect our order ourselves We were told we were not allowed to have larger glasses for drinking water as they were for the bar but if we wanted to order room service i e coke or a cocktail they could provide the larger glass Once leaving we requested a taxi be called We then got it the taxi outside the hotel only to have another taxi block us of and abuse our current driver to which hotel staff then joined the argument over the fare rather than resolving the issue The pillows and towels where also very small and the toilet very cramped and without and exhaust fan The air conditioning in the room also did not work well resulting in hot and smelly nights Very dissatisfied customers We stayed for both business and leisure
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable

Negative_Review: In both rooms small things were broken House keeping entered the room without knocking first
Positive_Review: First I had a room facing the very loud Main Street When I complained I was given an upgrade to a room facing the back

Negative_Review: Toilet was so small you had to open the door to change your mind breakfast was a disaster broken equipment food not replenished and unfortunately staff didn t seem to be too worried about these issues as the same thing happened for the next 2days
Positive_Review: Great location near metro near moulin rouge and Montmartre great deck for an afternoon drink before heading out

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Amazing way to spend our last night at the euro 2016 event After following our team it was great to relax in this lovely hotel with fantastic links to all the major sites and the bars and restaurants within walking distance was a bonus Wish we could go back GAWA

Negative_Review: bar staff are a disgrace 3 hours to get a glass of wine and some cheese reported it to reception who promised to report and write to us needless to say we never heard again
Positive_Review: the location and the room was clean

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Great location 2min walk to Place de Clichy metro which has direct line to Gare du Nord Lovely selection at breakfast and overall service was very good Room was spacious and comfortable Would definitely recommend

Negative_Review: The commode was in a closet which was too small Breakfast was pricey
Positive_Review: View of city large room for Paris standards free mini fridge beverages Close to Metro stops and in Montmartre

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: It was our first time in Paris The hotel was in a lovely part of the city and just a few minutes walk from the metro station Place de Clichy We were very happy with our room a very clean and modern interior We were especially happy with the wonderful view of the Eiffel Tower We had paid for a privilege room and received fluffy robes and slippers and there was a coffee machine tv and ipod docking station in our room The staff were very friendly We would definitely return here and would recommend it to friends

Negative_Review: he only draw back of this room was the commode closet There was barely enough room to close the door when you were in the sitting position and the closets interior was rough painted concrete light switch on the outside If you are a big person the door will remain open
Positive_Review: We stayed 6 nights in a room on the ninth floor The first room was big King sized bed slept great The 55 HDTV was better than ours at home with 4K resolution Refrigerator with complimentary sodas and waters TThe room s view was very good being able to see the Eiffel Tower and there was an alcove by the windows where we could store our suitcases and open the windows to see a large portion of Paris below us as we were in the hilly section of Montmarte We spent one other day in a room on the fifth floor Smaller than the first room but not by much Queen sized bed slept well same TV type the commode closet was larger finished walls inside the closet and so was the light switch The view was of a side street and the department store hi rise parking lot next door Oh a free single bottle of water in the refrigerator

Negative_Review: Gold ring was missed after they clean the room also they need to charge me 100 euro for cleaning the room
Positive_Review: Nothing staff was very rood and not helpfull

Negative_Review: Short staffed at breakfast and things were running out quickly with staff running around trying to keep up
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed and tasteful decor The breakfast area was bright and modern Reception staff were very polite and helpful

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: I liked the friendly staff they are very helpful and I just really like the comforts of the hotel it was excellent and when I return to paris I will definitely be booking here again

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: A very comfortable clean hotel The staff were very efficient and friendly nothing was too much trouble Short walk to the excellent Paris metro

Negative_Review: For our personal taste the mattress was too hard so we did not sleep as well as we might have liked
Positive_Review: The breakfast and bar food were of a good quality Most of the staff were smiley and very helpful

Negative_Review: No pool cardboard cups for drinking out of We bought our own mugs a great souvenir
Positive_Review: Proximity to Montmarte convenient for Metro into centre of Paris Extremely friendly and helpful staff Very comfortable bed Most importlantly the room had a bath

Negative_Review: Breakfast wasn t the best took a long time to refill we re waiting on plates the first morning worst of all the manager actually ran into the area chasing a mouse Classic basil fawlty moment Also didnt get the Eiffel tower view requested even though we paid for a premium room
Positive_Review: Liked the rooms close to everything Metro down the street

Negative_Review: The gym is a bit small and has no mats The breakfast was very disappointing and not worth the money There is a large variety of food but it is based on bread and the bread is the same quality as what you d buy at an American supermarket which is just a shame as there are a number of fine bakeries in the area
Positive_Review: The staff were really helpful and kind The location was great The room was clean and comfortable There s a delicious restaurant across the street Le Grand Phenicien

Negative_Review: The bedrooms overall were spacious and comfortable This was our second time staying in 3 years and I did notice that there was a bad smell coming from the drains in the bathroom and WC which was a bit off putting The bathroom suites and tiling could also do with upgrading within the room we stayed in to really put the hotel a step above others
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful and friendly and really put their best foot forward the hotel should be very proud of their efforts to ensure guests have a great visit to Paris and the hotel itself The hotel was modern and the public areas were lovely The location is perfect and very lively Paris is very accessible from the area

Negative_Review: VERY unfortunate timing arrived on the morning of Friday 13th So very sad
Positive_Review: The location was perfect close to the Sacre Coeur shops restaurants bars Moulin Rouge etc all within close walking distance Hotel staff were all very helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: Rather basic room bordering sterile with some noise from adjacent rooms There were no bathrobes and no shoehorn Wifi slightly erratic had to log in several times
Positive_Review: Clean modern room not too small No noise from the street Decent beds

Negative_Review: Tiny room old dirty carpet cheap furniture poor cleaning if not absent no minibar choice all in one shampoo gel soap conditioner lotion hammered to the wall no toiletries like pictured on the website plastic cups and glasses in what universe is this a 4 hotel Insufficient breakfast choice not worth Eur 20 advertised choice of gluten free treats was in fact one kind of roll over baked from outside and gooey inside every morning
Positive_Review: Excellent location close to underground within walking distance from points of interest Friendly staff Comfortable beds Quiet room Fitness facilities Good coffee in breakfast area

Negative_Review: Staff was confused about breakfast being included in the room rate which led to some hassle
Positive_Review: Clean comfortable and a great breakfast Location was good for my needs but not in the heart of everything That makes it a better price than other comparable properties in fancier neighborhoods

Negative_Review: The coffee machine and iPod dock didn t work and the room was really hot even in the middle of November Would have preferred a kettle instead
Positive_Review: Good view and location Clean and modern room comfortable bed Would stay again

Negative_Review: Probably just that the window didn t open wide enough
Positive_Review: An excellent location close to Montmatre Place de Clichy and Pigalle Reasonable breakfast pleasant terrace and great views of Eiffel Tower and Arc de Triomphe from our room The room was clean and well maintained and benefitted from a separate toilet We would happily return there

Negative_Review: The bar is dreadfully boring Pillows were hard
Positive_Review: My husband and I stayed here for our 24th wedding anniversary Amazing location in Montmartre right next to the famous cemetery The staff is excellent they handled reservations and taxis cheerfully and efficiently Pay for the Prestige Room for a high floor and a view of the Eiffel Tower it s very romantic to watch it sparkle on the hour And right near the P de Clichy subway

Negative_Review: On the morning of our departure we had three separate people knock on our door and come into our room
Positive_Review: The position is fantastic The hotel has been renovated since we last stayed there and the room we stayed in was well designed and very comfortable And there was a fabulous view across Paris

Negative_Review: Too expensive for a tiny small room Only 1 complimentary bottle water for 4 days didn t get us refresh All in one body wash and shampoo No iron
Positive_Review: Location Atmosphere

Negative_Review: All good
Positive_Review: The room was very comfortable The decor was fantastic and the bed was a great size The view was good you pay for what you get The proximity to Metro stations was very good

Negative_Review: We were put in the overflow room for breakfast the first morning where everything seemed to be a lower quality tinned fruit not fresh paper cups not china no cutlery initially fewer selection of breads no nespresso coffee machine very disappointing especially as that morning was our first wedding anniversary morning The key cards to the room only ever worked twice and had to be therefore constantly reset Was slightly disappointed at paper cups in bedrooms for hot drinks especially in a privilege room
Positive_Review: Our view was lovely

Negative_Review: Indifferent attitude of reception staff Room not serviced until late afternoon on two occasions reception s attitude was not our fault Breakfast not worth the charge made better value available outside
Positive_Review: Good location excellent for transport links by Metro or Bus Good choice of restaurants nearby

Negative_Review: Only one reception staff To ask a simply question we had to wait for 15 mins until 3 guests had cleared their payments All we wanted to know was the direction to the nearest Hop Hop Off Station Suggestion Have a Frequently asked questions with answers list in all Guest Rooms so that Guests will not have to interrupt the the Receptionist cum Cashier cum Guest Relations Officer all in one person
Positive_Review: Easy access to the Hop On Hop Off Coaches

Negative_Review: Mentioned to front desk that the thermostat control for air circulation heating and cooling wasn t working so they brought up a fan to correct the situation Good thing it wasn t hot out Make sure you check out everything in the room upon check in to confirm working condition Hotel s breakfast prices too high
Positive_Review: Great location for walking Montmartre and metro station close Lots of bistros in area

Negative_Review: Layabouts in front of Novotel next door Bus loads of hotel guests blocking the entrance temporarily
Positive_Review: Location Style Quality Roof garden Parking at a fee nearby Modern Good wifi Friendly

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: In a nice vibrant part of Paris near the Moulin Rouge with plenty of nice restaurants The staff were very nice We stayed in a privilege room overlooking the Paris lights and rooftops

Negative_Review: It was noisy with traffic at night The shower didn t work for more than 15 seconds Seemed to lose pressure Had to bathe instead
Positive_Review: I really liked the location It was in Montmartre area and quite convenient to metro

Negative_Review: We found the outside bar area bait expensive
Positive_Review: Our room was very comfortable clean with a lovely view of Paris the top of the Eiffel Tower

Negative_Review: The bathroom shower was insufficient to cover its spray so floor was soaked and as the shower had a two way door therefore the steam from the shower filled up the room
Positive_Review: Nice view room facilities really nice and modern design

Negative_Review: Staff was not helpful and actually seemed bothered when asked for assistance Had to call for extra pillows 4 times refrigerator froze up and standard answer was no one was available to fix Wanted to get ice since fridge did not work and was told to go to bar bartender was annoyed and just gave a cup full Did not replenish any toiletries in room floor was stained in many places etc
Positive_Review: Location was fine linens were clean room was quiet

Negative_Review: I did not like hotel facilities that make it look poor No irons offered later in the evening Poor ironing poor looking room Standard rooms look poor as well Cleaning staff enters even with No Disturb sign
Positive_Review: I liked the location

Negative_Review: Prepaid booking only to be told city tax had changed we paid they would not bend contacted boking com you have said they will refund us point being when you repay somthing that should be end of it staff were helpful but not over friendly as they were always busy
Positive_Review: Great location

Negative_Review: Carpet worn tiny tiny toilet room with no sink in toilet so have to go across room just to clean hands apart from disney channel and bbc news no other english tv channels you could not use the shower with out water getting everywhere

Negative_Review: The beds were so hard it was like sleeping on a cement slab My room was not cleaned properly either and no towels were replaced

Positive_Review: Very clean and comfortable hotel Quiet at night Good breakfast Very polite and helpful staff we dealt with David and he was very pleasant and welcoming Great location from which to explore Montmartre and Pigalle Easy to get to via the metro in Place de Clichy Overall excellent value for money

Positive_Review: Good location in Montmartre Very cordial and effective staff facilitated phone calls for reservations Silent and ample rooms Short wait given a smart use of tablets by staff

Negative_Review: Beds are very firm but comfortable enough Breakfast was good although eggs bacon and sausages are included in the buffet they are watery and not crispy however there are boiled eggs if morning protein is what your looking for The bread is fresh and warm most mornings with a variety of pastries croissants jams and cheese cold cuts Good variety of fruit and yogurt as well
Positive_Review: Location was great 10 min walk from metro Clichy Paid a little extra for a privileged room on the 9th floor room 947 came with coffee machine robe and slippers and a killer view of the Eiffel Tower and sunsets absolutely fantastic Whould definitely stay here again Very convenient and easy location to get around Good restaurants within a block either direction and 5 minute walk to catch a hop on hop off open tour bus I felt very safe walking around during the day on my own and the streets are busy with people in the evening too

Negative_Review: Lot of overdressed staff flouncing about but didn t really know the area unable or unwilling to give directions Not the most helpful Parking advertised but turns out to be a public garage vastly overpriced around 25 euros a day Rooftop balcony listed but on 1st floor Bad for taking photos
